paper_abstract: For a Type T is an element of {I, II, III, IV} of codes over finite fields and length N where there exists no self-dual Type T code of length N, upper bounds on the minimum weight of the dual code of a self-orthogonal Type T code of length N are given, allowing the notion of dual extremal codes. It is proven that for T is an element of {II, III, IV} the Hamming weight enumerator of a dual extremal maximal self-orthogonal Type T code of a given length is unique.
paper_title: ON DUAL EXTREMAL MAXIMAL SELF-ORTHOGONAL CODES OF TYPE I-IV
